section_a_workflow_definition.q02_trigger_event: a signed contract hits their CRM (HubSpot)
section_a_workflow_definition.q03_business_objective: launch their first campaign within 14 business days of contract signing
section_a_workflow_definition.q04_end_condition: Campaign goes live, CSM marks as "Launched" in HubSpot

section_b_volume_timing.q09_business_hours_expected: Yes, the target SLA is 14 business days.

q10_systems_involved: Various ad platforms (Meta, Google Ads, LinkedIn)
section_c_systems_handoffs.q11_manual_data_transfers: CSM manually creates project in Monday.com; CSM uploads assets to client's ad platforms.
section_c_systems_handoffs.q12_human_decision_gates: CSM decides when to create project in Monday.com (often delays); CSM decides which version of welcome email template to use; CSM schedules kickoff call (often 5-7 days out due to conflicts); CSM creates campaign brief content; CSM assigns tasks to creative team; CSM decides when to mark campaign as "Launched" in HubSpot.

section_d_failure_cost.q13_common_failures: CRM â†’ Monday sync is manual, CSM forgets or delays project creation; Welcome emails are inconsistent - each CSM has their own template version; Kickoff calls get scheduled 5-7 days out due to calendar conflicts; Campaign briefs sit waiting for client feedback for 3-5 days average; No visibility into which onboardings are at risk of missing SLA. Miss rate for 14-day SLA: 68%, Average delay past SLA: 4 days.
section_d_failure_cost.q14_cost_if_slow_or_failed: Each delayed onboarding risks client churn - estimated 8% churn rate for delayed clients. Average client lifetime value: $36,000. Staff time wasted on manual syncing: ~3 hours per onboarding, CSM hourly cost: $45. Client just lost their biggest account ($120k/year) due to 32-day onboarding delay. They also get bad reviews that hurt new business acquisition.

section_e_priority.q15_one_thing_to_fix: Auto-create Monday.com project when deal closes, with all tasks pre-populated

attachments.notes: Secondary priority: Dashboard showing onboardings at risk of missing SLA
